text: usase kaha gaya ki "mahal mein pravesh karo." to jab usane use dekha to usane usako gahara paanee samajha aur usane apanee donon pindaliyaan khol dee. usane kaha, "yah to sheeshe se nirmit mahal hai." bolee, "ai mere rab! nishchay hee mainne apane aapapar zulm kiya. ab mainne sulaimaan ke saath apane aapako allaah ke samarpit kar diya, jo saare sansaar ka rab hai.
